description: AQUAPACK delivers efficient, reliable water supply with compact design, advanced pump control, and durable performance for residential or industrial applications.
AVA606 is a high-performance vacuum system designed for robust industrial use, offering strong suction, efficiency, and corrosion-resistant construction.
AVD10185 provides deep vacuum capability with hybrid screw design, ensuring energy savings, low heat, and dependable operation in tough environments.

specifications.Flowrate: Made in 316L with special cartridge mechanical seals
